content: In the story, the mother successfully disposed of the daughter's soiled clothing by flushing it down the toilet. The overalls barely fit down the drain, but they eventually disappeared with a final splash. It can be inferred that the clothing was securely disposed of, as it was successfully flushed away without any issues. However, it is also possible that the clothing became stuck in the pipes and did not make it to the wastewater treatment plant. Without further information, it is impossible to know for certain whether the clothing was securely disposed of or not.
